name: hues-and-cues
description: Aplicaci√≥n web para jugar a Hues and Cues

scripts.build: tsc && vite build && [ -f public/tablero.webp ] && [ ! -f dist/tablero.webp ] && cp public/tablero.webp dist/ || echo 'tablero.webp already exists or not found' && mkdir -p dist/data && [ -f public/data/clue-words.csv ] && cp public/data/clue-words.csv dist/data/ || echo 'clue-words.csv already exists or not found'
